cast.name: 弗希雅·萨姆纳 Fuschia Sumner
杰森·阿兰·米勒 Jason Alan Miller

writer.name: 迈克尔·蒙吉罗 Michael Mongillo

director.name: 迈克尔·蒙吉罗 Michael Mongillo

introduction: F.B.I. Agent Paul Benjamin makes his way to Sleepy Hollow, New York to investigate the latest crime scene suspected to be the bloody mayhem of "The Anarchy Killer". Meanwhile, the nomadic killer escapes to Connecticut where he chooses the twentysomething Lansdale brothers and their nineteen-year-old sister as the targets of his next home invasion. Brought together by a series of seemingly preordained coincidences, the killer and F.B.I. agent find themselves face-to-face in an intense interrogation that reveals the violent nature they share. Now Agent Benjamin must summon the courage to accept that some things do happen for a reason.
